verses.t: His foundation{H3248} is in the holy{H6944} mountains{H2042}.for the sons: or, of the sons
LordThe {H3068} loveth{H157} the gates{H8179} of Zion{H6726} more than all the dwellings{H4908} of Jacob{H3290}.
Glorious things{H3513} are spoken{H1696} of thee, O city{H5892} of God{H430}. Selah{H5542}.
I will make mention{H2142} of Rahab{H7294} and Babylon{H894} to them that know{H3045} me: behold Philistia{H6429}, and Tyre{H6865}, with Ethiopia{H3568}; this man was born{H3205} there.
And of Zion{H6726} it shall be said{H559}, This and that man{H376} was born{H3205} in her: and the highest{H5945} himself shall establish{H3559} her.
LordThe {H3068} shall count{H5608}, when he writeth up{H3789} the people{H5971}, that this man was born{H3205} there. Selah{H5542}.
As well the singers{H7891} as the players{H2490} on instruments shall be there: all my springs{H4599} are in thee.
